document.full_text: the supreme court found a thorny path as it heard arguments on whether poor people facing jail time for failing to pay child support are entitled to court-appointed lawyers.
document.title: justices grapple with issue of right to lawyers in child support cases
lines_and_colors: the supreme court found a thorny path as it heard arguments on whether poor people facing jail time for failing to pay child support are entitled to court-appointed lawyers.
